data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A wise leader remembers that people perceive service in their own terms

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Adversity is the springboard to great achievement.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Every great achievement was once impossible.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: will always solve more problems than

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A drop of honey catches more flies than a gallon of gall

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A lot of people have great ideas, but nothing in the world is cheaper than a good idea with no action

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he gives up.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A man convinced against his will is of the same opinion still.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A rose only becomes beautiful and blesses others when it opens up and blooms. Its greatest tragedy is to stay in a tight-closed bud, never fulfilling its potential.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: All things come to him who goes after them.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: An obstacle is something you see when you take your eyes off the goal.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Any fool can criticize, complain, condemn, and most fools do.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Anything scarce is valuable; praise for example.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Attitudes are much more important than aptitudes.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Business is a lot like a game of tennis - those who serve well usually end up winning.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Do not bring me your successes; they weaken me. Bring me your problems; they strengthen me.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Don't ever let your problems become an excuse.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Don't mind criticism. If it is untrue, disregard it. If it is unfair, keep from irritation. It if is ignorant, smile. If it is justified, learn from it.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Everyone has peak performance potential - you just need to know where they are coming from and meet them there.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Getting something done is an accomplishment; getting something done right is an achievement.
